alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Dallas County through 830 AM CDT... At 744 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Old Cahaba Park, or 10 miles southwest of Selmont-West Selmont, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Selma, Selmont-West Selmont, Gardner Island, Tyler, Old Cahaba Park, Memorial Stadium, Burnsville, Dallas County Horse Arena, Potter Station, Skyharbor Airport, Whites Bluff, Craig Field Aiport, Selma Drag Strip, Edmund Pettus Bridge and Selma University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for central and south central Alabama.
